document_data.mainbody:
The Vernadsky family was a Raumviran noble family who inhabited the city of Almorel on the Lake of Mists in the Hordelands in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
The Vernadskys occupied the Vernadsky Fiefâ€”a large walled compound that was located almost directly in the center of Almorel along the Golden Way. Much of the estate bordered the promenade that led to Mechnik Nikitskys residence.
